title: Spring Design
intro: Springs are crucial mechanical components in various industries, storing and releasing energy, absorbing shock, and maintaining force. They are designed to operate under cyclic loading while maintaining strength, elasticity, and fatigue resistance.

sections.title: Draft
sections.content: The draft of the design was created in Onshape. An A4 sheet was used, the drawing scale is 1:2, and all dimensions are shown in millimeters.
